description: After a beautiful breakfast idea? Make mouths water with this waffle breakfast platter. With so many tasty toppings there's something for everyone.
keywords: Platter,Pescatarian,Orange,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Quick & easy,Halal,Vegetarian,Apr 2022,Waffle,Easter,Peanut free
name: Waffle Breakfast Platter Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place frozen berries, sugar and water in a small saucepan and bring to the boil over mediumhigh heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until berries are warmed through and liquid has reduced by half. Transfer to a bowl.
Toast waffles until golden and heated through. Break waffles into large pieces.
Arrange waffles, fruit, yoghurt and berry compote on a large platter. Scatter over coconut. Drizzle waffles with a little syrup. Serve with remaining syrup.
